trends: There have been 26 other sightings in Harrisburg
There were no other sightings in Harrisburg on or around July 31st 2001
Summary: Pale Redish/Orange Round Orb/Ball moving via no direct path.
divs: sighting detailsthis is a report that was taken during the pa mufon ufo public awareness day on may, 17, 2008 at the harrisburg, pa north shore library. the witness was going sky watching in the union deposit area of harrisburg, pa during the approximate month of august, 2001 for meteors and saw a pale redish\orange round orb\ball moving via no direct path in the sky. this was seen on 2 separate incidents during the same approximate time frame.
